Title: Quixo3D
Description: Quixo3D is based on the board game Quixo (http://www.gigamic.com/gigamic-jeux-quixo.html). It's written in C# with the UI in WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Quixo3D is based on the board game Quixo (http://www.gigamic.com/gigamic-jeux-quixo.html). It's written in C# with the UI in WPF (making liberal use of the 3D capabilities within WPF).
